about_the_game:
The music from TY the Tasmanian Tiger, from the original composer, George Stamatiadis, with over an hour of music from the first game in the series.

TY the Tasmanian Tiger 1 OST Steam Edition

  • Main Theme
  • Rainbow Cliffs
  • Two Up
  • Walk In The Park
  • Bulls Pen
  • Bridge On The River TY
  • Snow Worries

detailed_description:
SPECIAL NOTE

If you have purchased the soundtrack pack for TY the Tasmanian Tiger 4 on Steam, you do NOT need to purchase this DLC - these are the same MP3s as are available for that soundtrack pack.


About the Game

The music from TY the Tasmanian Tiger, from the original composer, George Stamatiadis, with over an hour of music from the first game in the series.

TY the Tasmanian Tiger 1 OST Steam Edition

package_groups.name: default

package_groups.title: Buy TY the Tasmanian Tiger Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8/8.1 (32bit and 64bit), Windows® 10 (32bit and 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7 1.8 GHz CPU dual-core. AMD 2.0 GHz dual-core.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 260 / Radeon HD 4000 Series / Intel HD Graphics 4000 with OpenGL 3.0 minimum.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compliant
  • Additional Notes: Xinput controller compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8/8.1 (32bit and 64bit), Windows® 10 (32bit and 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel quad-core 3.0 GHz or dual-core 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 2GB / Radeon HD 7970 3GB with OpenGL 3.0 minimum.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compliant
  • Additional Notes: Xinput controller compliant

short_description: The complete sound selection from TY the Tasmanian Tiger, from original composer George Stamatiadis, with over an hour of music from the first game in the series.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
